column4: hi, i'm using the 64-bit version of ubuntu 8.04. after installing the 2.6.24-17 kernel it does not show up in grub's boot menu. even running /sbin/update-grub does not help. it finds the kernel image but fails to update menu.lst: http://rafb.net/p/BbrLvK46.html
does anyone know how to solve this?
